remarks: Rule to change the bound variable in a maps-to function, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Dec-2013.)
statement:
cbvmpt2.1 $e |- F/_ z C $.
cbvmpt2.2 $e |- F/_ w C $.
cbvmpt2.3 $e |- F/_ x D $.
cbvmpt2.4 $e |- F/_ y D $.
cbvmpt2.5 $e |- ( ( x = z /\ y = w ) -> C = D ) $.
cbvmpt2 $p |- ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) = ( z e. A , w e. B |-> D ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B w x y z $.
